# Mac thing
*.DS_Store

# Visual Studio 2015 user specific files
.vs/
.vscode/

# Compiled Object files
*.slo
*.lo
*.o
*.obj

# Precompiled Headers
*.gch
*.pch

# Compiled Dynamic libraries
*.so
*.dylib
*.dll

# Fortran module files
*.mod

# Compiled Static libraries
*.lai
*.la
*.a
*.lib

# Executables
*.exe
*.out
*.app
*.ipa

# These project files can be generated by the engine
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace
*.sln
*.suo
*.opensdf
*.sdf
*.VC.db
*.VC.opendb

# Rider files
*.sln.DotSettings.user

# Precompiled Assets
SourceArt/**/*.png
SourceArt/**/*.tga

# Binary Files
Binaries/*

# Builds
Build/*

# Whitelist PakBlacklist-<BuildConfiguration>.txt files
!Build/*/
Build/*/**
!Build/*/PakBlacklist*.txt

# Don't ignore icon files in Build
!Build/**/*.ico

# Built data for maps
*_BuiltData.uasset

# Configuration files generated by the Editor
Saved/*

# Compiled source files for the engine to use
Intermediate/*
Plugins/*/Intermediate/*

# Cache files for the editor to use
DerivedDataCache/*
CMakeLists.txt
.idea/
cmake-build-debug/
cmake-build-release/
CodeGraphData/*
*.pdb

#project thumbnail
Plugins/Developer
Automation/Development/MemoryAnalyzer/bin
Automation/Development/MemoryAnalyzer/obj

#Automation Tools
AutomationTools/IniFilePatcher/bin
AutomationTools/IniFilePatcher/obj
AutomationTools/AutomatedTestAnalyzer/bin/*
AutomationTools/AutomatedTestAnalyzer/obj/*
!AutomationTools/AutomatedTestAnalyzer/bin/Debug
AutomationTools/AutomatedTestAnalyzer/bin/Debug/*
!AutomationTools/AutomatedTestAnalyzer/bin/Debug/*.exe
!AutomationTools/AutomatedTestAnalyzer/bin/Debug/*.dll
AutomatedTestResults
UnrealInsights.exe.lnk

#entitlements
!Build/*/*.entitlements

# Files generated when profiling the game
Profiling/*

# Binaries module for debug
*-DebugGame.modules


# Adding PS4 build and publishing files (only those inside sce_sys and titledata folders)
!Build/PS4/sce_sys/
!Build/PS4/sce_sys/*
!Build/PS4/titledata/
!Build/PS4/titledata/**

# Adding Switch build resources (like app icons)
!Build/Switch/Resources/
!Build/Switch/Resources/**
